backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor types for songs, artist profiles, user verification, and submissions, integrating storage, authorization, migration, and external modules. The file primarily declares data structures and system types used across the canister.
backend/migration.mo: Implements migration logic converting artist profiles keyed by Principal to profiles keyed by text IDs. Generates stable unique IDs per owner and rebuilds the artistProfiles map.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs. Used for build planning and traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptions of multiple frontend files summarizing their roles, especially around simplified multi-artist profile workflow. Serves as a reference for current frontend architecture.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documents a deployment failure fix related to missing config.ts, detailing configuration handling changes and verification steps. Explains improvements to actor initialization and build stability.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes. Applies base theming tokens for layout, components, and sidebar.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata, favicon, mount root, and script loader. Loads main.tsx for application startup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routing, theme provider, React Query, and authentication/actor initialization. Shows loading states and triggers profile setup modal for new users.
frontend/src/components/AdminAnnouncemen: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component logic.
frontend/src/components/AdminArtistManag: Displays and filters artist profiles for admins, with search, listing, and an edit dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/AdminEditArtistD: Dialog for editing an artist profile, including form state, photo upload, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/AdminTeamManagem: Manages invite codes for team members, including generation, listing, and copy-to-clipboard.
Form for creating or editing an artist profile with photo upload, approval checks, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a site footer with copyright text and a support email link.
frontend/src/components/GreenBadge.tsx: Displays a green badge image with tooltip, used to indicate verified artist status.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, auth controls, theme toggle, and current artist profile display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user for their name and saving it via a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/UserArtistProfil: UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting a user's artist profiles with dialogs and loading states.
frontend/src/components/UserEditSubmissi: Empty file placeholder for a user submission editing dialog.
frontend/src/components/UserPodcastSubmi: Empty file placeholder for a podcast submission section.
frontend/src/components/UserSubmissionsL: Empty file placeholder for listing user submissions.
frontend/src/components/VerificationBene: Empty file placeholder for a popup showing verification benefits.
frontend/src/components/VerificationProm: Empty file placeholder for promoting verification to users.
frontend/src/components/VerifiedBadge.ts: Empty file placeholder for a verified badge UI element.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity restoration, and state updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on artist profiles and related admin functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabbed UI showing artist profile management.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a blog listing page.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for an individual blog post page.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a community page.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with marketing content and login/navigation via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentCancel.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a payment cancellation page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a payment success page.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDashboard.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a team dashboard page.
frontend/src/pages/ThankYouPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a thank-you page.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboard.tsx: User dashboard showing tabs with artist profile management.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationSubscript: Empty file placeholder for a verification subscription page.
Utility to fetch bytes from an ExternalBlob and trigger a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/fileToExternalBlob.ts: Converts a File/Blob into an ExternalBlob and optionally attaches progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/isValidUrl.ts: Checks whether a string is a non-empty URL starting with http:// or https://.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them from sessionStorage, and handling hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and loaded plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing multi-artist profile requirements, existing features, and pending requests.
